original_title: WWE: Legends of Wrestling - Roddy Piper and Terry Funk
overview: In one of the most popular shows on WWE's on demand channel, panels that include WWE Hall of Famers Jim Ross and Dusty Rhodes discuss the life and times of the legendary "Rowdy" Roddy Piper and Terry Funk. These shows have never been available on DVD - until now!
title: WWE: Legends of Wrestling - Roddy Piper and Terry Funk
